title: True Love Waits 01: Ending A Marriage
description: “Drive this woman out!” "Throw this woman into the sea!”  When he doesn’t know Debbie Nian’s true identity, Carlos Huo cold-shoulders her.  “Mr. Huo, she is your wife,” Carlos’ secretary reminded him. Hearing that, Carlos gives him a cold stare and complained, “why didn’t you tell me earlier?”  From then on, Carlos spoils her rotten. Little did everyone expect that they would get a divorce.
author: Bai Cha
